Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.9 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.9.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.9.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.9.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
309.
3078Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
3079Anulomaṃ.
<< 10.9.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
